scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build ./src/background.ts --outdir ./dist && bun build ./src/popup/popup.ts --outdir ./dist/popup && bunx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp -r src/icons dist/icons
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist-firefox && bun build ./src/background.ts --outdir ./dist-firefox && bun build ./src/popup/popup.ts --outdir ./dist-firefox/popup && bunx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist-firefox/output.css && cp src/manifest.firefox.json dist-firefox/manifest.json && cp src/popup/popup.html dist-firefox/popup/ && cp -r src/icons dist-firefox/icons
scripts.package:firefox: rm -rf session-switcher-firefox.xpi && bun run build:firefox && cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../session-switcher-firefox.xpi .
